Uses of Package
com.metaio.sdk

Packages that use com.metaio.sdk
com.metaio.cloud.plugin   
com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view   
com.metaio.sdk   
 

Classes in com.metaio.sdk used by com.metaio.cloud.plugin
SensorsComponentAndroid
          This class provide an easy interface to the device sensors such as GPS, Gravity etc.
 

Classes in com.metaio.sdk used by com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view
MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
          MetaioSurfaceView callback.
SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
          Callback interface, any class which requires to update based on sensor values can implement this interface and receive new sensor readings when the sensors are updated, the class which implements this interface must register itself with the SensorsComponentAndroid.
 

Classes in com.metaio.sdk used by com.metaio.sdk
ARViewActivity
          This is base activity to use metaio SDK.
ARViewFragmentActivity
          This is base activity to use metaio SDK.
AudioRenderer
          Audio Renderer thread Renders 16-bit PCM audio samples
MetaioSurfaceView
          This class implements a custom GLSurfaceView and Renderer for the metaio SDK.
MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
          MetaioSurfaceView callback.
SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
          Callback interface, any class which requires to update based on sensor values can implement this interface and receive new sensor readings when the sensors are updated, the class which implements this interface must register itself with the SensorsComponentAndroid.
